name: Pack Your Things!
description:
Put the items in the box to earn points!

This is my first game that I've tried to make on my own. I know it doesn't really work. I worked really hard, but when working today everything kind of stopped working. I was using arrays to make the objects spawn, and when making the shop(which doesn't work) I tried to add to the array and everything broke from there. Different items are supposed to be worth different points, but errors kept popping up. I'm going to try to fix it eventually, but we were on a time limit. It would be great to hear your feedback!
